title: Dosage
description: How the medication is/was taken or should be taken.(This datatype is created as per HL7 FHIR Release 5 specifications)

xdm:sequence.title: Sequence
xdm:sequence.description: The order of the dosage instructions

xdm:text.title: Text
xdm:text.description: Free text dosage instructions e.g. SIG

xdm:additionalInstruction.title: Additional Instructions
xdm:additionalInstruction.description: Supplemental instruction or warnings to the patient - e.g. "with meals", "may cause drowsiness".

xdm:patientInstruction.title: Patient Instruction
xdm:patientInstruction.description: Instructions in terms that are understood by the patient or consumer.

xdm:doseAndRate.title: Dose and Rate
xdm:doseAndRate.description: Amount of medication administered, to be administered or typical amount to be administered

xdm:type.title: Type
xdm:type.description: The kind of dose or rate specified

xdm:rateRatio.title: Rate Ratio
xdm:rateRatio.description: Amount of medication per unit of time

xdm:rateRange.title: Rate Range
xdm:rateRange.description: Amount of medication per unit of time

xdm:rateQuantity.title: Rate Quantity
xdm:rateQuantity.description: Amount of medication per unit of time.

xdm:maxDosePerPeriod.title: MaxDoseperPeriod
xdm:maxDosePerPeriod.description: Upper limit on medication per unit of time.

xdm:maxDosePerAdministration.title: MaxDosePerAdministration
xdm:maxDosePerAdministration.description: Upper limit on medication per administration.

xdm:maxDosePerLifetime.title: MaxDosePerLifetime
xdm:maxDosePerLifetime.description: Upper limit on medication per lifetime of the patient.
